definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Why do you apply for American transit visa?
sentences.chinese: 你辦美國過境簽證的理由是什麼？
